questions.question: (Write) Adaptive features of plants in mountain region
(Write) Why some plants have thorns in body
(Write) What happens when we touch poision ivy plant
(Write) What are saprophytic plant
answers: plants that can not make their own food
absorb food from dead plants, animals

questions.question: (Write) How are plants of grass family useful
answers: We get sugar from sugarcane plant
dried grass is used for packing
roots of plants bind the soil
wheat, rice jowar provide ce-reals to human and animals

questions.question: (Write) Adaptation of plants in plain region
answers: they have many branches that spread around
thin leaves help to keep cool by eva-po-ration
